title: Eddie Hughes – 2021 Comments on Tackling Homelessness
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Eddie Hughes, the Minister for Rough Sleeping, on 21 December 2021.
content:
I have seen first-hand the devastation of those who come face to face with homelessness, and my heart goes out to anyone in this situation.
